ComicInfo.Summary: Chained Reaction: Siphon and the leaders of the Blue try to set up a summit with the leaders of the human world to talk about peace between their peoples. Aspen, Chase and Finn return to Muria to help in whatever way they can but Aspen is dubious that peace can ever be achieved. Meanwhile, Anya approaches Killian and asks him to cease his hostilities against the surface world. She reveals that she is once again pregnant with his child and she does not want to raise this baby in a world of conflict. As Killian softens and begins to acquiesce, his daughter Kiani rebels and vows to continue to battle the humans.
ComicInfo.Title: Chained Reaction
